definitions.definition: a person whose job it is to organize a particular event, or to provide services to particular people, or to take care of a particular place:
examples: Stewards will be inspecting the race track at 9.00.

definitions.definition: a person who serves passengers on a ship or aircraft
a person who organizes the supply and serving of food at a club:
examples: He's the steward of the City of Wakefield's Working Men's Club.
